      • deleteCustomerButton

        public void deleteCustomerButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        attempts to delete customer from DB and all their appointments.

        * @lambda this lamba is beneficial in that it looks cleaner. The code "listens" for the button "OK" to be clicked. If not * clicked, it simply will not doing anything further. *
